RelatedSentence: Trend Micro bestows honour at partner conference .
Security vendor Trend Micro has announced at its partner conference in Sydney that Ingram Micro has won the Distributor of the Year award for the second consecutive time .
Security vendor Trend Micro has announced at its partner conference in Sydney that Ingram Micro has won the Distributor of the Year award for the second consecutive time .
It 's a great reflection of the strong partnership that has developed between Trend Micro and Ingram Micro , said Lee Welch , Ingram Micro 's senior business manager for enterprise software .
We 've been working really well together and doing some very innovative things .

A1: We 've been focusing strongly on enabling and supporting
RelatedSentence: We 've been focusing strongly on enabling and supporting our Trend Micro resellers with programmes such as our Security Pass education programme , and that 's proven to be a very successful strategy , said Welch upon accepting the accolade .

A0: the Distributor of the Year award
RelatedSentence: The distributor said in a statement that it is designed to introduce resellers to Trend Micro security solutions , help them to build a pipeline of sales prospects , and provide support in the way of collateral , training and other resources to help them close sales .
